name: David (Simon Adriaan)
description:
After spending 20 years of his life in prison David is finally released. For the first time in years he is free to make his own decisions, or is he? Is even that taken away from him...

We accidently deleted our source code about an hour before deadline so we couldn’t finish everything that we wanted to. If Dialog boxes don't show up keep pressing A on controller or U” on keyboard. The game is done when the robot starts following you.

All art and music was created during the Game Jam.

Thank You
